name: Battle for the Stone
description:
There were once two kids. Jerry and Chris found a perfect stone, but they didn't know which one of them came first. The stone wasn't big enough for both of them. There was only one solution. They both agreed to Battle for the Stone!

Concept:

A local multyplayer game about two kids fighting over a rock.

Your goal is to fight for the stone and kick the other kid straight into the lava that slowly takes over the entire ground.

In the "infinite" gamemode you need to survive as long as possible while Chris (your enemy) is invincible. There is no end to that battle, but you can still try to get a decent highscore!

I dare you to beat my highscore of 178 seconds.

Download the game for better performance and audio quality!

How to play:

Player 1

Move with "A" or "D"

Jump with "W"

Kick with "S"

Player 2

Move with arrow keys

Jump with up arrow key

Kick with down arrow key

This game was made in about 7 days for the MashUp Game Jam 2022.

Randomized prompts:

Genre: Fighting

Theme: Balance

Setting: Sea

Item: Water

Programming, music and art were made by myself during the jam.

v1.1

Headphones recommended!
